entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
